name: Magic Clash
description:
Magic Clash

Magic Clash is a versus fighting game with a strong emphasis on magic and aerial combat !

Each character uses a variety of ground and aerial attack ! Hitting your ennemy will award you with Mana. And with enough Mana, a character can do a unique Special Attack that gives him an advantage over their opponent.

Play locally with a friend or over the internet with the online mode.

Controls

The game require at least one controller to be played locally.
